title: BlackRock's Laipply: Maintain Your Inflation Protection
description:
Stephen Laipply, global co-head of iShares fixed income ETFs at BlackRock, says multi-sector portfolios should include some inflation protection. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.”
 (Source: Bloomberg)
